Name: Rat Pack Manhattan
Ingredients: 2.5 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist and Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
RINSE glass with orange liqueur, discard excess and set to one side.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: An orangey riff on a classic Perfect Manhattan .
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2000 by Wayne Collins at High Holborn bar in London, England. See: Manhattan cocktail history
Nutrition: One serving of Rat Pack Manhattan contains 179 calories
